wikitext.*:
'''Zimraphel''', title of [[Ar-Zimraphel]], a translation of [[Tar-Míriel|Míriel]] into [[Adûnaic]].<ref>{{S|Akallabeth}}</ref>  It means "jewel-daughter".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}</ref>  ''[[Zimir|Zimra]]'' means, disputably, ''jewel'', while ''[[phel]]'' is possibly ''daughter''.
